TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out!

First of all, we would like to make sure that after filling out the AD information, you saved the configuration and only then tested it.

Secondly, if you have already done the steps mentioned, could you please send us a screenshot of the error that you are receiving?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best Regards,
Oana Sutoiu | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
